thread.title: Portland Marathon 2015 photos of the 3:40 pace group
thread.title_full: Portland Marathon 2015 photos of the 3:40 pace group | OregonLive.com

author: Mike Zacchino | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Marathon 2015 photos of the 3:40 pace group
text:
The 2015 Portland Marathon wound through the streets of Portland this morning.
This year we're creating multiple galleries based on pace time. The Red Lizard Running Club paced people trying to run the course between 3:00 to 5:00 hours.
The gallery above is a collection of images along N Willamette near the 18.5 mile mark of the 3:40 pace group.
If you or anyone you know finished within 3-5 hours, click the appropriate link below and see if a person you recognize is there.
